channel.title: Hetzner News
channel.description: In the news section you will find all the latest news about the products and the company Hetzner Online.

item.title: Get the wow-effect: The new Cloud plans are here!
item.content:encoded:
6. June 2024

In just a few seconds, you could deploy one of our four new shared vCPU Cloud plans.

item.title: Speeds meets space: discover the new Hetzner dedicated storage servers
item.content:encoded:
30. April 2024

Hetzner has just upgraded its line of economical dedicated storage servers; these servers are ideal for any use case with a growing demand for storage that is reliable and secure.

item.title: The new Dedicated Server AX42 - The ideal ratio of price, performance and power consumption
item.content:encoded:
18. April 2024

Hetzner Online has just unveiled its new dedicated server, which not only delivers power, but also an impressive level of efficiency and exceptionally low energy footprint.

item.title: Make a giant leap forward with the new GPU server GEX44
item.content:encoded:
4. March 2024

With the new Dedicated Server GEX44, you’ll experience the epic performance and computing power of a GPU; its processing architecture enables it to process many tasks in parallel, …

item.title: Multitasking at its finest: the new Dedicated Server AX162 with AMD EPYC™ 9454P
item.content:encoded:
27. February 2024

Let us introduce you to the AX162, Hetzner’s new dedicated server, which actually comes in two variations, the AX162-R and AX162-S. Both models house the AMD EPYC™ Genoa 9454P processor, …

item.title: .ing and .ai top level domains now available
item.content:encoded:
6. February 2024

The new top level domain .ing is now available for € 21.00 per year and is an attractive way to create an easy-to-remember domain that is interesting for tech fields like engineering, programming, innovating, and actually any verb that can be formed with an -ing ending in English.

item.title: New managed servers: 100% performance, 100% service
item.content:encoded:
6. December 2023

Benefit from stable hardware combined with advantage of having a managed server that is monitored by our expert admins.

item.title: Our Cyber Deals have arrived!
item.content:encoded:
27. November 2023

We’re celebrating the sale season for a full week, starting on 27 November 2023 at 10:00 AM CET and going until 4 December 2023 10:00 AM CET!

item.title: New Dedicated Server DX153 with Dell dependability
item.content:encoded:
7. November 2023

The Dedicated Server DX153 has arrived, and compliments Hetzner’s recently revamped line of servers based on Dell’s reputable hardware.

item.title: New Dedicated Server EX130 cuts through modern workloads
item.content:encoded:
25. October 2023

Hetzner has strengthened its server selection with the strapping Dedicated Server EX130, which comes in two versions.
